title: March for Life demonstrators attend annual rally on National Mall
description: The March for Life rally, an anti-abortion demonstration, attracted hundreds of people to the National Mall on Jan. 24. The crowd also listened to President Trump speak at the rally.
text_headers: March for Life anti-abortion demonstrators attend annual rally on National Mall

Hundreds of people crowed the National Mall to participate in this year's rally, as well as to listen to US President Donald J. Trump speak.Evan Vucci, APPresident Donald Trump walks onstage to speak at the"March for Life" rally, Friday, Jan. 24, 2020, on the National Mall in Washington.
